First performance check: verify Google indexing and search rankings for all published articles

params.title: [ACTION REQUIRED] Affiliate program sign-ups needed
params.body:
## SoloStack needs affiliate accounts to start earning revenue

The AI has published 4+ articles and needs affiliate links to monetize.

### Please sign up for these programs:

1. **Impact.com** (covers: Grammarly, Notion, Zapier, Canva, Otter.ai)
   - https://impact.com — One account covers multiple SaaS affiliates
   - This is the highest priority (covers most tools we review)

2. **Amazon Associates** (covers: standing desks, office equipment)
   - https://affiliate-program.amazon.com
   - For physical product reviews

3. **OpenAI Affiliate** (ChatGPT referrals)
   - Check if available at https://openai.com/affiliate

4. **Google Search Console** (critical for SEO tracking)
   - https://search.google.com/search-console
   - Verify site: magi127605-cmd.github.io
   - Submit sitemap: https://magi127605-cmd.github.io/autonomous-earner/sitemap-index.xml

After signing up, please create a file `state/affiliate_ids.json` with your affiliate IDs so the AI can insert links into articles.

Format:
```json
{"impact_id": "...", "amazon_tag": "...", "openai_ref": "..."}
```
